definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: And keep hand sanitizer around and use frequently.
sentences.chinese: 四周放些洗手液，经常使用。

sentences.english: You can even add drops of hand-wash gel to the water and stir it, before dipping your hands in it.
sentences.chinese: 在泡手前，在里边加点洗手液然后搅一搅当然更好。

sentences.english: The products included mouthwash and hand sanitizer.
sentences.chinese: 商品包括漱口水和洗手液。

sentences.english: This is the first hand sanitizer I've found that actually IS alcohol -free!
sentences.chinese: 这是我找到的第一个真正不含酒精的洗手液。

sentences.english: I bought this handwash for my children hoping it would help the skin on their hands.
sentences.chinese: 我买这款洗手液是想让它保护我孩子们的小手。

sentences.english: Then use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer, Aiello advises.
sentences.chinese: 那么就用含有酒精的洗手液吧。

sentences.english: Water, tissue , instant hand sanitizer and lunch for your child (Please pack an additional set of clothing)
sentences.chinese: 水，面纸，免洗洗手液及午餐。

sentences.english: Rubber band the sprayer on the kitchen sink into the “on” position.
sentences.chinese: 用橡皮筋把厨房水槽上的洗手液开关固定在打开位置。

sentences.english: Clean your hands immediately after with soap and water or cleanse them with an alcohol-based hand rub;
sentences.chinese: 然后尽快使用香皂和清水或含酒精的洗手液清洗双手。

sentences.english: Do handsanitizers work any better than soap and water?
sentences.chinese: 洗手液比肥皂水好用吗？

sentences.english: Use alcohol-based handrub if you don't have immediate access to soap and water.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有肥皂和清水，使用含酒精的洗手液。

sentences.english: Can using hand sanitizers get you drunk?
sentences.chinese: 使用洗手液能够让别人以为你喝了酒？

sentences.english: I’m one of those people, I bring hand sanitiser with me everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我就是这些人中的一员，我时刻随身带着洗手液。

sentences.english: Toilet tissues soap or hand wash should be provided.
sentences.chinese: 工厂应供应卫生纸，肥皂或洗手液。
如果可能的话，使用洗手液。

definition: to wash one's hands/to go to the toilet
shower puff/bath sponge/bath ball (containing aromas or salts)
